name: Spectrum Catalysts, Inc.
overview:
Spectrum Catalysts, Inc., an innovative and GREEN Company for the 21st Century, has been in business for over 30 years, providing quality services and products to commercial, industrial, municipal and utility facilities. The Company prides itself on manufacturing and distributing environmentally friendly chemical products and innovative specialty safety devices.

Spectrum Catalysts offers a wide range of industrial products by specializing in producing environmentally friendly green products that are All-Natural, Non-Toxic and Biodegradable, as a replacement to harmful and toxic materials. The majority of our products are manufactured and distributed directly from the company’s manufacturing plant in Central Islip, NY.

Spectrum Catalyst has been at the forefront of emission particulate reduction, and economical catalyst advancement for fuel oils used in vehicles, building boilers, coal facilities and garbage incinerators. Spectrum Catalyst has also perfected the commercialization of Non-Glycol (Ethylene and Propylene Glycol) applications meeting the specific needs of every industry with their product lines of Leak Detection Fluids, Anti-Static Elimination Fluids, Anti-Freeze/Coolants, Freeze-Protected Liquid Seal Relief and Drilling Lubrication Fluids.

Spectrum Catalyst products have been field tested and approved by major Utilities in the Northeast Region including: National Grid, PLC. - Largest investor-owned utlity in the world. Consolidated Edison Company of New York - One of the largest investor-owned energy companies in the U.S. UGI Utilities, Inc. - UGI Corporation supplies energy to 630,000 customers in Pennsylvania and owns 44% of AmeriGas Partners, L.P. the largest retail marketer of propane in the U.S. In addition, LEAK-Detect has been field tested and approved by PECO, Orange and Rockland Utilities, Inc. and PSEG under the Company’s Private Label Program.
